channel.title: Black screen with G-Sync enabled
channel.description: I get the Crowbar Collective splash screen, but nothing else. Black screen, and the audio plays. If I disable G-Sync, it works fine. Running 1440p@144hz. Have already tried the -width, -height, and -fs launch options. Relevant hardware: * i7-5280K * MSI X99A SLI Krait Edition * 32GB RAM * 2x GTX 980 Ti * Acer XB270HU + Dell U2715H Are there any log files or anything that would helpful to post?

item.title: Black screen with G-Sync enabled
item.dc:creator: hydrosome
item.description:
I get the Crowbar Collective splash screen, but nothing else. Black screen, and the audio plays. If I disable G-Sync, it works fine. Running 1440p@144hz. Have already tried the -width, -height, and -fs launch options. Relevant hardware:

  • i7-5280K
  • MSI X99A SLI Krait Edition
  • 32GB RAM
  • 2x GTX 980 Ti
  • Acer XB270HU + Dell U2715H
    Are there any log files or anything that would helpful to post?

Read full topic
